text: All the stitches in the world can't sew me together again.
Lay down... lay down. Gonna stretch me out in Fernandez funeral home on Hun and Ninth street. Always knew I'd make a stop there, but a lot later than a whole gang of people thought...
Last of the Moh-Ricans... well maybe not the last. Gail's gonna be a good mom... New improved Carlito Brigante... Hope she uses the money to get out.
No room in this city for big hearts like hers.
Getting the shakes now, last call for drinks, bars closing down... Sun's out, where are we going for breakfast? Don't wanna go far. Rough night, tired baby... Tired...
Favor gonna kill you faster than a bullet.

I'm reloaded! Okay? Come on in here, you motherfuckers! Come on, I'm waitin' for ya! What, you ain't comin' in? Okay, I'm comin' out! Oh, you up against me now, motherfuckers! I'm gonna blow your fuckin' brains out! You think you're big time? You gonna fuckin' die big time! You ready? HERE COMES THE PAIN!
You are the average of the five people you most associate with.
I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse.
If you can quote the rules, then you can obey them.

Oz. That's the name on the street for the Oswald Maximum Security Penitentiary. Oz is retro. Oz is retribution. You wanna punish a man? Separate him from his family, separate him from himself, cage him up with his own kind. Oz is hard times doing hard time.
Sometimes it's good to be human.
I have everything. Everything I need. Every lose satisfied. But it's not enough.
They say every dayâ€™s a gift, but why does it have to be a pair of socks?
A wrong decision is better than indecision.
Quiet people have the loudest minds
